description: Aprende is an educational platform for vocational skills in Latin America and the United States’ Hispanic markets, offering a wide array of courses and training.

Qwikwire provides real estate solutions for brokers and property developers, including SaaS property management solutions, SAP-integrated billing and invoicing systems, cross-border settlements via licensed remittance channels, and property listing.
ArabiaWeather provides weather products, services and solutions to consumers and businesses in the Middle East and North Africa.
Arabnet is an events, insights and innovation program organizer focused on tech business and innovation in the MENA region.

Arabot is the first intelligent chatbot built specifically for the Arabic language, leveraging AI and a deep machine learning to accurately and efficiently analyze conversations across Arabic dialects.
Aranda Software offers business service management solutions.
Arbusta provides agile productive tech squads that can rapidly be sourced at competitive price.
Aerobotics is an agritech business that helps farmers protect their crops and manage yields using drones and machine learning.
Archdaily is an architecture website that provides knowledge, inspiration, and tools for architects.
Arizona is a Brazil-based advertising campaign management platform.
Armut.com is an online marketplace that allows individuals to hire local service professionals based on quotes they provide.
Arquivei sells a digital bookkeeping program that streamlines invoicing for its customers.
Artemest connects the world of luxury handcrafted goods to global enthusiasts, offering a curated marketplace for design objects made by artisans and independent makers.
Arvento develops and sells hardware and software that enables its clients -businesses and government agencies- to monitor their automotive fleets from computers and phones.
ASCON develops solutions in the areas of design and construction of vessels and naval craft.
ASK offers human capacity building services for the Arab region, and acts as the bridge between education and employment.
Asuan designs effective food processing systems for food plants in Latin America from processing, to debonding, to boxing.
Atlantia Search is Latin America’s largest marketplace for consumer insights.
Atmo Digital Media offers varied and quality content in the areas of corporate TV, out-of-home digital media, and audiovisual for events.
Autochek is a one-stop auto-needs platform that facilitates the sales and purchase of vehicles, provides car financing, and offers aftersales maintenance services.
